flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=63>>63 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+63=$<<120+63=183>>183
So he makes 183*25=$<<183*25=4575>>4575 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 4575*4=$<<4575*4=18300>>18300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36.0, not 63.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
